summary: Extracts FFT or Waveform data from the incoming signal
author: 56cdab144f85abfb36c6c089

ports.name: Audio In
ports.text: The audio signal you want to analyse

ports.name: Refresh
ports.text: Does the analysis, mostly you want to connect this to `MainLoop`

ports.name: Type
ports.text: The analysis function to use, either "fft" or "waveform"

ports.name: Smoothing
ports.text: `0` represents no time averaging with the last analysis frame. If your want smoother values increase it

ports.name: Max Decibels
ports.text: The largest decibel value which is analysed by the FFT

ports.name: Min Decibels
ports.text: The smallest decibel value which is analysed by the FFT

ports.name: Return Type
ports.text: The data type of the elements in the array, either `byte` or `float`

ports.name: Audio Out
ports.text: The same audio signal as in `Audio In` (pass through)

ports.name: Analyser Array
ports.text: The array containing the audio analysis data
